bookText.htmlContent: Snake-morphs can be found in all but the coldest regions of the realm, from the southern desert to the jungles in the north and all across the wide fields around Dominion.

While the individual personalities of snake-morphs vary greatly from one individual to another, they have a reputation for being quite clingy. This is most likely due to the fact that their anatomy is a bizarre mix between cold and warm-blooded, and so just like their feral counterparts, they enjoy cuddling up to the hot bodies of others.

While the common term 'snake-morph' refers to bipedal variants of this race, they are very much a small minority of the total snake population, as the vast majority of this race are found in the form of lamia. Slithering around on their long, snake-like lower bodies, this common subspecies is not well adapted to city or town life, and so are most regularly seen out in the countryside. A lamia which also has wings is referred to as a 'melusine'.

Like most other races, snake-morphs get affected by arcane storms. Being exposed to arcane thunder will make snake-boys seek out a partner to mate with, while snake-girls will go into heat.

A snake-morph's offspring will be a mixture of snake-morphs and offspring of their partner's race.
